channel.title: Mapzala
channel.description:
[img]https://img46.imageshack.us/img46/2606/gordonl.jpg[/img] And so, my second map is in the making.
A bit over 30 hours into it now. I had a rough idea of what to work on from before, I had planned on doing a map using the industrial area near in my hometown as reference. This map deviates quite a bit from the original plan, but I'd say that my original ideas worked as a base for this. Anyway.
At the moment it's just a single map. It's starting to get bigger so I'll probably have to slice it up. Working will probably be easier that way too.
The map started from what is now the workshop area. Then added what turned out to be the break room for workers. After that, added the big hall, and the hallway leading to it. From there I put the hallway leading to the outside (which wasn't made yet at this part). Then got an idea to make the outside area, a second floor and added area to behind the breakroom. This area turned into an office workplace, with cubicles (not propped yet). Player spawn is currently there. That's the work I've made so far roughly, and there's a lot more to do.
I've made an HD quality walk around the map so far which I uploaded in Youtube. For the tour, click [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6FPYktXyvZo&hd=1'][u]HERE[/u][/url]. The video is quite dark. The map isn't exactly full daylight either, but definitely a lot brighter than the video would make you assume.
Comments, critique, ideas, anything. GIVE ME. :hmph:

item.title: Mapzala
item.dc:creator: Door
item.description:
uk_sniper:

15 bucks is better than a kick in the gonads.

No one who entered and did a good job got kicked in the balls, most of them got a “Play it now!” rating and are being rated very highly from the public.

RabidMonkey and 1nsane are awesome devs and should be given cookies every day for helping people who are new to mapping out.

Good job Sam; I told you you’d do better than me.

Read full topic

item.title: Mapzala
item.dc:creator: samzala
item.description:
Danke schön. I feel like I should be thanking some people, I wouldn’t have gotten it without them. Thank you Nosehole, Süggestive, Door, Savant, Gom Jabbar, Siggers and DarkBabe for playtesting. Big thanks for DB in specific, your criticism was flat out awesome. Also, thank you Cpl.1nsane and Rabid Monkey for helping out with hammer issues. Another big thanks goes to Rabid Monkey in specific, helped out a lot. And the person who notified me of the very existence of the competition, Gom Jabbar, thanks.
If there’s someone who I’m forgetting, give me a punch and I shall put you on the pedestal you deserve.
Pedestals.

Read full topic

item.title: Mapzala
item.dc:creator: samzala
item.description:
Bump[COLOR=‘Black’] and double post <.<
I’ve been working on the map quite diligently for the past four days or so, and am hoping for a finished product by Monday. Entering for the Hunterville map comp, 100$ main prize and 15$ honorary mention prizes.
I don’t have the time to post an update video because there’s like only 2 days left till the last entry date, and making a video would take several hours. But I’ll get around to that once I’m done.

Read full topic
